sentences.english: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華不容什麼人欺負他們，爲他們的緣故責備君王。

sentences.english: Somehow, I just don''t like to change horses in the middle of the stream.
sentences.chinese: 不知什麼緣故，我就是不喜歡中途換人。

sentences.english: That is because we are only doing double integrals so far.
sentences.chinese: 這是由於我們纔剛開始做二重積分的緣故。

sentences.english: I think that's because Baggio is our favorite star.
sentences.chinese: 我想那是因爲巴喬是我們倆最喜歡的球星的緣故吧。

sentences.english: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away, and believed on Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 因有好些猶太人，爲拉撒路的緣故，回去信了耶穌。

sentences.english: Poor digestion can be caused by defective mastication of the food in the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 消化不良可能是由於嘴裏的食物沒有充分咀嚼的緣故。

sentences.english: 16 at the taunts of those who reproach and revile me, because of the enemy, who is bent on revenge.
sentences.chinese: 都因那辱罵毀謗人的聲音，又因仇敵和報仇人的緣故。

sentences.english: Did you shy away from full-hearted service for the sake of Christ?
sentences.chinese: 可有逃避爲基督的緣故全心全意作事奉？

sentences.english: This is the reason that the blue white passivating film is too thin.
sentences.chinese: 這是由於藍白色鈍化膜層太薄的緣故。

sentences.english: This was due to hindered reaction in the chlorosulfonation.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲氯磺化反應存在位阻效應的緣故。

sentences.english: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
sentences.chinese: 因耶和華我們神殿的緣故，我要爲你求福。

sentences.english: It is generally considered not advisable to act that way.
sentences.chinese: 爲了某種緣故不願說明行爲者是誰。

sentences.english: For the sake of the house of the Lord our God, I will seek your prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 因耶和華我們神殿的緣故，我要爲你求福。

sentences.english: And he said, I will not destroy it for ten's sake.
sentences.chinese: 他說，爲這十個的緣故，我也不毀滅那城。

sentences.english: For my own sake, for my own sake, I do this. How can I let myself be defamed ?
sentences.chinese: 我爲自己的緣故必行這事，我焉能使我的名被褻瀆？

sentences.english: More young adults move back in with their parents because of finances.
sentences.chinese: 由於經濟緣故，許多成年人搬回與父母同住。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
